verbs.description: healthy [V: steamed] [ARG1: dumplings] my family loves chinese food but it hard to find healthy choices in restaurants or at the grocery store so instead i make these healthy dumplings into a great family activity with many hands helping out filling the dumplings goes by fast when we are done we have lots of dumplings to put in the freezer for months to come —melody crain houston texas
